thread.title: Intermolecular Earnings Per Share $0.00

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Intermolecular Earnings Per Share $0.00
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Intermolecular Inc:
* INTERMOLECULAR REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.01
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.00 * Q4 REVENUE $10.5 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $9.6 MILLION TO $9.9 MILLION * ‍SEES Q1 NET LOSS BETWEEN $0.02 TO $0.03 PER SHARE​ * Q1 ‍NON-GAAP NET LOSS PROJECTED TO BE BETWEEN $0.7 MILLION AND $1.0 MILLION, OR BETWEEN $0.01 TO $0.02 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
